name: Kalash Kankaria
title: Machine Learning Engineer
summary: Machine Learning Engineer passionate about rapid experimentation and production-ready AI systems. I specialize in LLM/NLP, end-to-end ML deployment, and building solutions that fail fast, learn faster, and deliver measurable impact.

highlights: Shipped production ML systems serving 100K+ daily users with 99.9% uptime
Reduced model inference latency by 60% through optimization and deployment strategies
Built end-to-end MLOps pipelines enabling rapid experimentation and continuous deployment
Led cross-functional team to deliver AI-powered features impacting core business metrics
Implemented A/B testing framework for ML models with statistical significance tracking
Developed NLP models for text classification achieving 95% accuracy on production data
Built recommendation system increasing user engagement by 30%
Designed and implemented feature engineering pipelines processing TB-scale datasets
Mentored junior engineers and established ML best practices across the team
Built predictive models for customer churn reducing attrition by 25%
Developed automated reporting dashboards used by executive team
Implemented data quality monitoring and alerting systems

projects.name: Large Language Model Fine-tuning Framework
projects.description: End-to-end framework for fine-tuning transformer models on domain-specific datasets with automatic hyperparameter optimization and distributed training support.
projects.impact: Reduced model training time by 40% and improved task-specific performance by 15%

projects.name: Real-time Sentiment Analysis API
projects.description: Scalable microservice for real-time sentiment analysis supporting multiple languages with sub-100ms latency and 99.9% uptime.
projects.impact: Processes 1M+ requests daily with enterprise SLA compliance

projects.name: MLOps Pipeline Automation
projects.description: Complete MLOps solution with automated model training, validation, deployment, and monitoring using GitOps principles.
projects.impact: Reduced deployment time from weeks to hours, enabling daily model updates

projects.name: Computer Vision Quality Control System
projects.description: Automated quality inspection system using deep learning for manufacturing defect detection.
projects.impact: Achieved 99.2% accuracy, reducing manual inspection costs by 70%

projects.name: Time Series Forecasting Platform
projects.description: Multi-model forecasting platform supporting various time series algorithms with automated model selection and ensemble methods.
projects.impact: Improved forecast accuracy by 35% over baseline statistical methods

projects.name: Document Processing Intelligence
projects.description: NLP pipeline for automated document classification, entity extraction, and information retrieval from unstructured text.
projects.impact: Automated 80% of manual document processing workflows
